程序包 com.chinamobile.android.connectionmanager.manager

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    BaseManager
    base manager for notify to ServiceController
    ConnectionManager
    the manager manage network connection receive WiFi or 3G status from system and notify to ServiceController
    can connect WiFi and 3G
    can open WiFi radio and scan
    PolicyManager
    The manager manage policies, provide interface of below: 1.request to policy server to get policy list
    2.get the active policy
    3.track the policy time and notify to ServiceController
    ReportManager
    the manager to manage report action it provide create a report, update report data, send report data to server and receive response from report server
